meanings.definition: Having a surface that is level or smooth.
meanings.sent1: The ground here is the flattest in the whole park.
meanings.sent2: She found the flattest stone to skip across the water.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to balance on the flattest part of the fence.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the flattest it had ever been after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The flattest pancake won the competition for perfect shape.
